name: Birthday Cake Defense
description:
Made for Pixel Game Maker MV's Anniversary Game Jam 2020!

You are a clown that got called to a bad birthday gig. The balloons are attacking the birthday cake! Luckily you brought your candlestick flamethrower with you, good luck!

  •  WADS = Movement
  •  Left Click = Flamethrower

Feel free to leave your highest survival time in the comments!

Credits:

  • Baz - Developer - https://twitter.com/BazratCreates
  • Zetasis - Pixel Art - https://mythril-age.itch.io/
  • Sudo - Music and SFX's - https://twitter.com/JumpGameStudio
  • Abstract - 'Good Try' Beat - https://twitter.com/Abstract_Origin
